PC Number: 2004-0845

Date: 2004-07-20

                     Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 11 of the Ministries and Ministers of State Act, hereby assigns the Honourable Tony Ianno, a Minister of State to be styled Minister of State (Families and Caregivers), to assist the Minister of Human Resources Development styled Minister of Social Development in the carrying out of that Ministerâ€™s responsibilities.
